revised_title: Discovering Diabolical Points in the Spectra of Triangles
tldr: The authors explore the energy levels of a two-parameter family of triangular quantum billiards and discover diabolical points, which are accidental degeneracies between energy levels. They use a Green-function technique to compute the levels and find several diabolical points for low-lying levels. The authors also confirm the conical structure of these points and analyze the variation of wavefunctions and nodal patterns around them.
